content.title: Sugar CRM
content.data:
Sugar CRM

You can combine your live chat and SugarCRM using this integration. It will allow you to enhance your sales and follow-up activities. With this integration, you will be able to:

  • Create new accounts and leads
  • Edit existing entries and update them with chat history
  • Grab contact information from information entered in pre-chat surveys
  • Install this integration and simplify your contact management actions.

Installation

In order to install this integration, go through the following steps:

  1. Login to the Sugar CRM
  1. Navigate to the Administartion page, by clicking on "Admin" menu item in the user context menu
Pic. 1 Sugar CRM Administration page
  1. In System section click on "OAuth Keys" link
Pic. 2 Sugar CRM OAuth Keys page
  1. In the toolbar in OAuth Keys menu, click on "Create OAuth Key" menu item
Pic. 3 Sugar CRM Create OAuth Keys
  1. In the create new OAuth Key page fill the required fields, "OAuth Version" field should be "OAuth 2.0" and "Client Type" field should be "Sugar User". And Press "Save".
Pic. 4 Sugar CRM Creating new OAuth Key
  1. In Livehelp Sugar CRM integration section fill the required fields
Pic. 5 LiveHelp Sugar CRM integration page with filled fields
  1. Press connect button

After checking you credentials, the information about integration will be saved and you will able to get or save info about contacts, leads and chats in Sugar CRM.
